page.title: 20MICKLEY COUNTY FIRST SCHOOL
page.content: Stone built,over 100 years old. 73 pupils aged "rising 5" to 9. Most from Mickley Village;some travel by school bus from two neighbouring small villages. {Staff:}3 Teachers,Clerk,Caretaker,Cook Cleaner,Kitchen Asst.,2 Supervisory Assts."Dinner ladies" to children. {Playgroup}on premises under control of Headteacher,supervised by retired teacher with 2 registered helpers. Good support from parents.Funds raised supplement normal Education Allowance. {Canteen}used as hall/gymnasium. Games against other schools,football, netball,rounders. {Gymnastics coaching}by teacher. {Swimming instruction}weekly at Prudhoe Baths.Children pay 30p plus 25p travel Annual events,Christmas concert,sports evening,well supported in village. {CLASS PROJECT ed.by Jennifer Lansberry
